name: Personalized Meal Planning
description: Allows users to create personalized meal plans based on their dietary needs, preferences, and health goals.  Includes features for specifying dietary restrictions (e.g., vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free), setting calorie targets, and selecting preferred cuisines.
business_value: Addresses the core user need for personalized nutrition guidance, increasing user engagement and satisfaction. Caters to diverse dietary needs and preferences, expanding the app's target audience (Maria, Klaus, Lisa, Tom, Anna).

user_stories.title: Create a personalized meal plan
user_stories.story: As a Maria, I want to create a personalized meal plan based on my dietary preferences (vegetarian), calorie goals (1800 calories/day), and preferred cuisines (Italian, Mexican), so that I can easily follow a diet that meets my specific needs and helps me achieve my weight loss goals.

persona.name: Maria
persona.background: Maria is a busy professional who is looking to lose weight and improve her overall health. She is a vegetarian and enjoys Italian and Mexican cuisine. She has a limited amount of time to cook and prefers quick and easy meals.
persona.motivation: To lose weight and improve her overall health by following a personalized diet plan.
persona.goal: To reach her target weight and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

acceptance_criteria: The app allows me to specify my dietary preferences, including vegetarianism.
The app allows me to set a daily calorie target.
The app allows me to select my preferred cuisines.
The app generates a meal plan that meets my dietary preferences, calorie target, and preferred cuisines.
The meal plan includes a variety of recipes.
The meal plan is easy to follow and includes nutritional information for each meal.
The app allows me to save my meal plan and access it later.
The app provides grocery lists based on the selected meal plan.
